description: Remove a trailer classification from a job production plan.
permissions: User must be authorized to update/delete the related job production plan; access is delegated to job production plan permissions.
side_effects: Deletes the job production plan trailer classification record and touches related broker tender job schedule shifts after commit.
validation_notes: The <id> argument is required. --confirm is required. Deletion is blocked if the trailer classification is referenced by a lineup job schedule shift or if it is the only trailer classification on a confirmed job production plan that requires trucking.
